entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Mascouche

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
